task.summary: Default task
Update loader-utils dependency

Remove bower_components test imports

#23
Update less peerDependency to 2.1

Update less-loader to work with less 2.x
Now the less-loader uses a less-plugin to add a WebpackFileManager. This file manager is now responsible for webpack's special resolving logic. Since less 1.x doesn't have a plugin api this change is incompatible with less 1.x.
